name: WizFight: Flappy Edition
description:
This game is local multiplayer only for up to four players.

WizFlappyFight is a version of WizFight where players play as disembodied wizard heads that hop around killing each other. It is a hectic local multiplayer deathmatch with 18 playable disembodied heads, two maps, and two game modes.

I originally made this after making Flapphogg for Flappy Jam and wondering if WizFight would still be fun if I mixed it with gameplay elements from Flappy Bird. It was never developed into anything more than a proof of concept, but, being little more than a WizFight mod, it is quite playable despite that.
